long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ipso AI is a useful AI assistant that helps you schedule meetings without the email back and forth. Ipso AI reads and understands the content of your emails, as well as your calendar events, to suggest suitable times to schedule meetings.

Ipso AI is for those times when a booking link or meeting poll won't work, either due to social expectations or power dynamics. Simply install the extension and let Ipso AI handle the rest.

Open an email, click the reply button, and then click the "Propose Times" button. Ipso AI will write an email draft for you suggesting reasonable times to meet given the request and your existing calendar events.
